name: ArunkumarPandyan Ramar
title: Web Content Management Professional
summary: Arunkumar is a Senior IT Professional with more than 20 years of information technology industry experience that includes more than 7 years hands on experience in design, development and implementation of Content Management and Portal solutions using Oracle WebCenter Product Suite. Arun Ramar has excellent communication, leadership and project management skills

experience.summary: Principal Evangelist for Adobe Marketing Cloud solution implementation
As a Solution Architect, I was involved in the design, development and implementation of many WebCenter Sites related projects.
Assisted in stabilizing the Oracle WebCenter portal environment. Worked on the Framework to eliminate bugs that affected the functionality of Oracle WebCenter Portal

certification.cert-name: Graduate Certificate in Enterprise Resource Planning Systems (SAP)
